info.name: Multi-Restaurant API
info.description:
REST API Collection untuk Aplikasi Pemesanan Restoran Multi-Cabang.

## Cara Pakai:
1. Set variable `base_url` ke URL server (default: http://localhost:8000/api)
2. Login terlebih dahulu via Auth > Login
3. Token otomatis tersimpan di variable `token`
4. Semua request authenticated akan menggunakan token tersebut

## Roles:
- **owner**: Full access semua cabang
- **admin**: Hampir penuh kecuali delete critical
- **manager**: Operasional cabang sendiri
- **waiter**: Input order & proses pembayaran
- **kitchen**: Update status pesanan

item.name: Orders
item.description:
Order Lifecycle:
1. Waiter: Create Order (PENDING)
2. Kitchen: Update Status (COOKING → COMPLETED)
3. Waiter: Process Payment (PAID)
4. Cancel Order

request.description: Detail order beserta items, user, dan status logs.

Buat order baru. Access: waiter only.

Order number otomatis di-generate: ORD-YYYYMMDD-XXXX
Status awal: PENDING
Notifikasi otomatis ke staff dapur.

Update status order. Access: kitchen only.

Valid transitions:
- pending → cooking
- pending → completed
- cooking → completed

Notifikasi otomatis ke pelayan saat completed.

Proses pembayaran. Access: waiter only.
Order harus berstatus COMPLETED.

Payment methods: cash, qris, transfer, debit, credit
Kembalian dihitung otomatis.

Batalkan order. Access: owner, admin, manager, waiter (own only).
Tidak bisa cancel order yang sudah paid/cancelled.

Tampilan dapur: order pending & cooking.
Access: owner, admin, manager, kitchen.

Order yang sudah selesai, siap dipanggil dan diproses pembayaran.
Access: waiter only.
